article_title: Can you place Weld County on a map of Colorado? – The Denver Post

og.description: Map Game: Can you place Weld County on a map of Colorado?
og.title: Map Game: Can you place Weld County on a map of Colorado?

article_summary:
Click and drag the marker to where you think Weld County is on this map of Colorado.
Play the map game hereResults: Here’s a map of where everyone guessed where Weld County was.
#map-canvas { width: 100%; height: 500px; margin: auto; }//if ( window.location.hash !== ‘#deve’ ) window.location.replace(“http://extras.denverpost.com/app/mapgame/games/colorado.html”);$(document).ready( function () {mapg_config ={log_guesses: 1,//log_url: ‘admin/index.php’,log_url: ‘http://denverpostplus.com/app/mapgame/tally.php’,target_name: ‘Weld County’,target_slug: ‘weld-county’,target_type: ‘boundary’,boundary_file: ‘http://denverpostplus.com/app/mapgame/www/kml/county/co/weld-county.kml’,unit: ‘miles’, // miles or kmzoom: 6,centerlatlng: new google.maps.LatLng(39,-105.32),styles: [{“featureType”: “road”,“stylers”: [{ “visibility”: “off” }]},{“featureType”: “administrative.locality”,“stylers”: [{ “visibility”: “off” }]},{“featureType”: “administrative.province”,“stylers”: [{ “visibility”: “on” }]},{“featureType”: “administrative.province”,“elementType”: “labels”,“stylers”: [{ “visibility”: “off” }]}]};});Where is Weld County on the map?
When you drop it, the answer will appear, and you’ll see how your guess compares with everyone else who has played.
